PS3 & CINAVIA try this:

1. Go to Sound Settings
2. Audio Settings
3. Optical Digital
4. Check all Boxes
5. Save settings
6. Go to Audio Multi Output
7. Turn on and say OK

Confirmed working from 3.10 to 3.55
Make sure your Sound System works with the options.

All you may need is the top 3 boxes checked. If you select the two Linear PCM options that aren't grayed out, it will say; "if your device doesn't support the frequency selected the speakers may become damaged" - Make sure your volume is low, but audible, so you can verify that you have sound.(THIS INFORMATION CAME FROM POWERSLAVE0(I think that was his name, I take no credit for this information but can confirm that it works on JB WUTANGRZA 3.55 CFW).

So I've heard this is legit, yet I've also heard it was R5. Bottom line - is this a Dvdrip?
